response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than $100. Considering its value to you, I propose to sell it to you for $120. This price reflects its worth while also allowing us to cover our costs and make a fair profit. I hope you find this offer attractive and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 120}
